text: The Bat-Yam International Biennale of Landscape Urbanism (also called Urban Action) is an international event held every two years in Bat-Yam, Israel. It is dedicated to urban design and landscape urbanism. The event was first held in 2008 as an initiative of the city hall of Bat-Yam. == Other websites == * Bat Yam International Biennale of Landscape Urbanism 2010 Category:2008 establishments in Israel Category:Events in Asia Category:Urban design Category:Tel Aviv Category:Urban planning exhibitions
title: Bat-Yam International Biennale of Landscape Urbanism
